page.name: Web Cloud
page.page_description: Welcome to the Web Cloud status page for real-time information on system performance and availability.
page.headline: Web Cloud OVHcloud Status : incidents, maintenance
page.notifications_email_footer: You received this email because you are subscribed to Web Cloud's service status notifications.

incidents.name: [GRA][Webhosting] - Cluster031
incidents.message: Start time : 26/12/2022 05:30 UTC Start time : 26/12/2022 05:44 UTC Service impact : Websites are unreachable on cluster031 Root cause : The incident was due to a hardware problem. Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

incidents.name: [Scheduled] [GRA7][WebPaaS] - Routine Maintenance
incidents.message: Please note that this maintenance is cancelled.

incidents.name: [GRA1][Webhosting] - Cluster028
incidents.message: Start time : 21/12/2022 14:16 UTC Service impact : All offers on cluster028 are impacted. Some connections to your website may fail. Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made. Workaround : If a customer is impacted, he should use the ipv6 of Cluster028 that suits his country: https://docs.ovh.com/fr/hosting/liste-des-adresses-ip-des-clusters-et-hebergements-web/#cluster-028
